Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I’m a software engineer most-proficient in the MERN tech stack, including experience with Node.js, React.js, Express, and various other front-end and back-end frameworks and libraries. I’m comfortable working with SQL and noSQL databases, common testing frameworks and developer tools, and deployment with AWS.

Before becoming an engineer, I spent a number of years as a professional soccer player, as well as a successful stint in sales. I enjoy solving problems, collaborating in a team environment, and bringing added value to each and every one of my clients. These experiences provided me a unique and valuable perspective when facing difficult challenges, communicating effectively, and problem solving in a group dynamic.
